name: Glass Painting: Winter Art
description: Find the Christmas mood with an exciting arcade game Glass Painting: Winter Art! This winter puzzle is a real catch for all glass art amateurs. Create amazing snow landscapes with bright color palette and visual effects!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Processor: Dual Core + Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: 512MB + DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 200 MB available space
